product_name: Smith Transit Snow Goggles - White Danger Frame - Women's
long_description: The women's Smith Transit White Danger snow goggles feature a rose copper tinted lens, good fog control and a comfortable fit, all for an excellent value. RC36 lens tint combines rose and copper base tints to improve depth perception, increase contrast and cut glare in all conditions; allows 36% visible light transmission. Vents at the top of the cylindrical lens help combat fogging. Cushy single-layer face foam offers a good seal against your face. Adjustable strap is backed with a silicone bead so it stays in place on your helmet. The Smith Scope snow goggles fit small-size faces and come with a microfiber storage bag.
short_description: The women's Smith Transit White Danger snow goggles feature a rose copper tinted lens, good fog control and a comfortable fit, all for an excellent value.
